# Smart Investment Tips

Smart Investment Tips provides educational content for trading and investing.
The site focuses on beginner-friendly guides, market dashboards, symbol analysis, journaling workflows, and simulation practice.

## Preferred canonical domain
https://si-tip.com

## Primary pages
- Home: https://si-tip.com/
- Market Dashboard: https://si-tip.com/market.html
- Symbol Board: https://si-tip.com/symbol.html
- Trading Journal: https://si-tip.com/journal.html
- Simulator: https://si-tip.com/simulator.html
- News: https://si-tip.com/news.html

## Editorial intent
- Education-first content (not investment advice)
- Practical risk management and trading process improvement
- Clear Q&A, step-based explanations, and scenario-driven guidance

## Content freshness
- Pages are updated periodically; use on-page "Last content update" where provided.

## Contact
https://si-tip.com/contact.html
